message:
I was working on a new idea and I want to see the last output of my linq queries as sql statements, first I used SQL profiler then after some quick search for alternatives i found this one and it helps me to reach my target quickly and save my time
there is a free version & it's enough
story: Sameh Saeed shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: LINQPad - The .NET Programmer's Playground
caption: linqpad.net
description: LINQPad is not just for LINQ queries, but any C#/F#/VB expression, statement block or program. Put an end to those hundreds of Visual Studio Console projects cluttering your source folder and join the revolution of LINQPad scripters and incremental developers.

data.message:
It is a great tool, I have been using it for years, there is also another open source free alternative called CSScript
http://www.csscript.net/
